context: A security incident involving internal phishing was detected where a user named Lucas Grey with an email Lucas Grey@niseko.alpineskihouse.co was observed to have sent phishing emails from their device to recipients inside the organization. This user account might have been compromised as part of a lateral movement attempt by an attacker. The malicious URL involved in the phishing email was `http://ym018491661.wittytree-b6f239d6.northeurope.azurecontainerapps.io/`.
question: What is the recipient email address that received the malicious URL in the phishing email sent during this incident?
solution_steps: The account with email `Nina Sullivan@vnevado.alpineskihouse.co` was observed sending phishing emails internally, suggesting possible account compromise.
The email account `santiago@vnevado.alpineskihouse.co` received emails containing malicious URLs, which were later removed.
